//: Appears in the refugee center as shopkeeper with missions.  Faction critical.

dynamic_line.yes: What are you buying, what are you selling?
dynamic_line.no: What are you buying, what are you selling?

responses.text: What is it like being a scrap merchant around here?
Would you be willing to let me buy anything?
Do you have a task for me?

dynamic_line.yes: It's a veritable scavenger's paradise out there! Seemingly any house you can go to is a surprise of riches, you never know what you can find even from the most basic consumer electronic.
dynamic_line.no: It's a veritable scavenger's paradise out there! Seemingly any house you can go to is a surprise of riches, you never know what you can find even from the most basic consumer electronic.

dialogue.describe: I'm not really sure if I trust you or not yet, how about you find an object for me? Some scouts have found a rare electronic device, unfortunately it's been surrounded by harmful robots. Would you consider getting it for me?
dialogue.offer: I'm not really sure if I trust you or not yet, how about you find an object for me? Some scouts have found a rare electronic device, unfortunately it's been surrounded by harmful robots. Would you consider getting it for me?
dialogue.accepted: Thanks for accepting my offer, now go out there and get it!
dialogue.rejected: Why ask about a task and then reject it?
dialogue.advice: Be careful, Newts can be pretty hard to shoot, don't underestimate them.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found the part yet?
dialogue.success: Great work, I might have more tasks for you in the future
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: Oh well, at least you tried. That's more than what most people do around here.

dialogue.describe: Alright, this one's a bit more difficult, We've caught wind of a group of robots that have appeared near our little town. We think they're Chinese, I guess they were launched over during the cataclysm or something. Would you kill them for us?
dialogue.offer: Alright, this one's a bit more difficult, We've caught wind of a group of robots that have appeared near our little town. We think they're Chinese, I guess they were launched over during the cataclysm or something. Would you kill them for us?
dialogue.accepted: Thanks for accepting my offer, now go out there and get it!
dialogue.rejected: Why ask about a task and then reject it?
dialogue.advice: Be careful, some of the Zhuazi drones can shoot out bolts of lightning.
dialogue.success: Great work, I might have more tasks for you in the future
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: Oh well, at least you tried. That's more than what most people do around here.

dialogue.describe: You have proven your worth as a fighter, so I request an even more difficult task from you now. A few Salamanders have been stalking us from a nearby forest. Their movements are a bit unnatural, usually Salamanders just stand in the open as a form of intimidation. I feel like somebody, or something, is compelling them to do this. Please kill these horrid synthetics for us.
dialogue.offer: You have proven your worth as a fighter, so I request an even more difficult task from you now. A few Salamanders have been stalking us from a nearby forest. Their movements are a bit unnatural, usually Salamanders just stand in the open as a form of intimidation. I feel like somebody, or something, is compelling them to do this. Please kill these horrid synthetics for us.
dialogue.accepted: Let's hope you make it back alive.
dialogue.rejected: Pretty understandable, I wouldn't want to stare down a few Salamanders myself either.
dialogue.advice: Try to avoid getting within melee range of those Salamanders, their legs can send you flying.
dialogue.success: To be frank, I thought you would die, thanks for killing those beasts for us.
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: Oh well, at least you tried. That's more than what most people do around here.

dialogue.describe: Okay, I think this will be the last task I entrust you with, not because I doubt you, it's just that I think nothing can really top this. A scout has detected a patrol of military bio-synthetics moving towards our base. It's imperative that you take them out for us.
dialogue.offer: Okay, I think this will be the last task I entrust you with, not because I doubt you, it's just that I think nothing can really top this. A scout has detected a patrol of military bio-synthetics moving towards our base. It's imperative that you take them out for us.
dialogue.accepted: I entrust our safety to you, and you alone. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: That's unfortunate, but so be it.
dialogue.advice: The military variants of the Newts and Salamanders often come equipped with firearms, try to close the distance as soon as possible or snipe them from a long distance.
dialogue.success: This is amazing news! I think I owe you a particular gift. We found it at a Chi Industries store some time ago, and never knew what to do with it.
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
